thread.title: Baby on the way for Andrew Keegan and Arista Ilona
thread.title_full: Baby on the way for Andrew Keegan and Arista Ilona - UPI.com

author: Karen Butler
title: Baby on the way for Andrew Keegan and Arista Ilona
text:
LOS ANGELES, Oct. 24 (UPI) -- Actor Andrew Keegan has announced he and his girlfriend, Apple employee Arista Ilona, are expecting their first child.
"My beloved partner and I are excited to welcome a baby into our lives and our community. We look forward to embracing the sacred responsibility of parenthood as well as learning from this spirit," Keegan told People magazine Friday .
"Our intention is to raise our child in a co-creative environment where truth and love are foremost. We welcome your thoughts and prayers for this incubating life."
The couple did not reveal their baby's sex or anticipated birthdate.
Keegan is best known for his work in TV's Party of Five and 7th Heaven , as well as the film 10 Things I Hate About You .
